teamPage.description: Share your link and earn commissions for each member of your team.
teamPage.noLevelsData: You don't have any team members yet. Start inviting!

faqPage.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqPage.a1: EverChain Bot is an economic simulation platform where you can acquire virtual Chips that automatically generate passive income in USDT.
faqPage.a2: Simply acquire a Chip from our shop. Once purchased, it will start producing USDT every 24 hours, which you can claim directly to your main balance.
faqPage.q3: How can I withdraw my earnings?
faqPage.a3: You can request a withdrawal from your profile. Make sure you have set up your withdrawal password and meet the minimum required amount.
faqPage.q4: Is it safe to invest here?
faqPage.a4: We use standard security protocols to protect your account and funds. However, as with any income platform, please participate responsibly.

tasks.noTasks: No tasks available at the moment.
